JTalker

Package com.coswald.jtalker.gui

All GUI elements for the JTalker application. There is a lot to the JTalker application, but mainly there are four parts: the color chooser panel, the canvas panel, the chat panel, and the frame itself. The menu bar is defined within the frame itself. Any constants that are used by any graphical element are defined within GUIConstants.

Since:
JTalker 0.1.5
Version:
0.0.1
Author:
C. William Oswald
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Colorizer
    Changes a color to another given color.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ANSIColorConstants
    A set of descriptions for specific color constants within the ANSI standard.
    CanvasPanel
    A panel that allows drawing on it using a mouse.
    ColorChooserPanel
    A panel that allows the selection of one color.
    ColoredTextPane
    A JTextPane that supports ANSI colors.
    GUIConstants
    A set of descriptions for specific GUI constants within a JTalker application.
